overview: Timothy and Max are partners in the junk business. They take poor young Mary in as a boarder. Mary gets a job in Nathan's office and falls in love with him, but his mother feels she is beneath Nathan. Nathan faces disaster unless he can corner a particular stock, with which Timothy and Max's room happens to be entirely papered.
tagline: Don't let any child grow up without enjoying childhood's greatest pleasure, seeing Jackie Coogan.
title: Old Clothes
